mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kari_task_commit (task_id, commit_sha, commit_message, author_name, author_email, committed_at, commit_url) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{commitSha}, #{commitMessage}, #{authorName}, #{authorEmail}, #{committedAt}, #{commitUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT task_id, commit_sha, commit_message, author_name, author_email, committed_at, commit_url FROM kari_task_commit WHERE task_id = #{taskId} ORDER BY committed_at DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM kari_task_commit WHERE task_id = #{taskId} AND commit_sha = #{commitSha}
